latestUpdates.data: Vaikunta Dwara Darshanam – Electronic Dip results for 30.12.2025(Vaikunta Ekadasi), 31.12.2025(Vaikunta Dwadasi) and 01.01.2026 have been published. Please [Click Here](https://ttdevasthanams.ap.gov.in/assets/misc/images/v4/Audit_Report_Vaikunta_Dwara_Darshanam.pdf?updated_at=2025-12-02T08:30:48.293Z) to view the list of selected Pilgrims.

Angapradakshinam Seva e-DIP ticket registrations for Tirupati (Urban & Rural), Tirumala, Chandragiri Mandal and Renigunta Mandal locals (only) for 06.12.2025 (Saturday) will be available between 10:00 a.m. and 4:00 p.m. on 04.12.2025. Please [Click Here](/agp/dashboard?flow=agp&flowIdentifier=agp)

Om Namo Venkatesaya
 
The Online Quota of General Srivari Seva for Tirumala and Tirupati, Navaneeta Seva, Parakamani Seva for the month of January - 2026 will be released at 3 PM on 26.11.2025.
 
The age Limit of General Sevaks (Tirumala) for 22-01-2026 slot is 18years to 50years only as Radhasapthami is on 25-01-2026.
 
Reporting Days:
 
General Sevaks have to report on the same day of their Seva booking date for both Tirupati and Tirumala.
 
Parakamani Sevaks have to report one day before their seva booking date in Tirumala between 2 pm and 4 pm.

TTD - Local Temples Seva Quota for December-2025 will be available for booking w.e.f 26.11.2025 at 10:00 AM. Please [Click Here](/arjitha-seva/slot-booking?section=pilgrim-details&flowIdentifier=arjitha-seva&templeName=Sri%20Padmavathi%20Ammavari%20Temple&sevaName=All)
Sri Srinivasa Divyanugraha Visesha Homam at Saptha Gau Pradhakshina shala, Alipiri Tickets for the month of December-2025 have been completed.
Tirumala and Tirupati Accommodation Quota for February-2026 will be available for booking w.e.f. 25.11.2025, 03:00 PM. Please [Click here](/accommodation/instructions?flow=acc&flowIdentifier=acc)
Special Entry Darshan (Rs.300) tickets for February-2026 have been completed.
Senior Citizens / Physically challenged quota for February-2026 has been completed.

Sri Padmavathi Ammavari Temple, Tiruchanoor Special Entry Darshan (Rs. 200/-) tickets for December-2025 will be available for booking w.e.f, 25.11.2025, 10:00 AM. Please [Click Here](/spat/slot-booking?flow=spat&flowIdentifier=spat)

The Online Seva (Virtual participation) and connected Darshan quota for Kalyanothsavam, Unjal Seva, Arjitha Brahmotsavam & Sahasra Deepalankara Sevas of Srivari Temple, Tirumala for February-2026 will be available for booking w.e.f. 21.11.2025, 3:00 PM. Please [Click Here](/virtual-seva/seva-instructions?templeName=Srivari%20Temple&sevaName=All&flowIdentifier=virtual-seva&flow=virtual-seva)

Total number of Seva E - Dip Registrations received for February-2026 and click below for selected list: 

**Thomalaseva**: 564137 

**Archana**: 555243 

**Astadala Pada Padmaradhana**: 530739 

**Suprabhatham**: 626991 

Please [Click Here](https://ttdevasthanams.ap.gov.in/assets/misc/images/v4/PROD_DIP_SELECTION_2025_11_20_2025_11_20_EDIP_SELECTIONS.pdf?updated_at=2025-11-20T06:35:26.568Z)
Darshan & Accommodation Quota to the Trusts / Schemes donors for the month of February – 2026 will be available for booking w.e.f 26.11.2025 from 11:30 AM onwards
Tirumala Angapradakshinam tokens for February-2026 have been completed.
Darshan & Accommodation Quota to the SRIVANI Trust (Rs. 10,000/-) donors for the month of February – 2026 will be available for booking w.e.f 24.11.2025 from 11:00 AM onwards
Srivari Arjitha Seva tickets quota for the Sevas like Kalyanam, Unjal Seva, Arjitha Brahmotsavam, and Sahasra Deepalankara Seva for February-2026 has been completed.
The periodical seva FLOAT FESTIVAL in Srivari Temple, Tirumala will be conducted from 26.02.2026, seva tickets have been completed.
To generate Digital passbook for the donations made before September 2016, please [click here](https://tirupatibalaji.ap.gov.in/#/donorPassbook)

The Advance booking Arjitha Seva ticket holders of Sahasrakalasabhishekam, Vishesha Pooja, Nijapada darshanam are requested to avail Break Darshan or to get refund instead of Seva for their booking made in advance. Please [click here](https://arjithaseva.tirupatibalaji.ap.gov.in/#/) to avail break darshan or to get refund.
To enable self service for the existing    donors, please [Click here](https://tirupatibalaji.ap.gov.in/#/donorSelfservice)
